songs.title: Step To Me
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah, Yeah, Yeah

[Hook]
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me, Step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me, Step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me, Step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me, Step to me bitch, Step to me

[Verse 1]
Rap as fuck slow
Baby bone
Cold like snow
I'm on my future shit
So you already know
How I go
When I eat ya hoe
Out on the low
She falling up
When I'm in it
When I finished
She wanna go eat dinner wit me

[Interlude]


[Verse 2]
I won't do none of that yo
I gotta make moves
So I gotta make dope
I'm talking that bread
I'm talking that flow
I'm talking' that paper that make the world go round
See through you hoes
OG sound
You ain't a friend, Then you was a I
They touching the box, unless I get top
Test that hoe she a box top down
Steel not paid one damn dime
Ya pussy tryna fuck wit mine
Can't hear you like you isn't mine
She blow my phone up
Like a m???
Through this shit a bunch of times
They claiming shit
But she ain't mine

[Hook]
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch, Step to me
Step to me bitch, step to me bitch
